thread.title: Amazing stay would happily go back
thread.title_full: Amazing stay would happily go back - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: angieashberrypvg
title: Amazing stay would happily go back
text: Stayed for 4 nights mid March for husbands 50th birthday. The hotel and all staff are fantastic. The hotel is situated perfectly to walk to all sites of interest or the metro/trams are nearby. Breakfast was lovely full continental with scrambled eggs,bacon,sausage and mushrooms. Happy hours 5pm-10pm in the bar half price drinks and an inclusive buffet nibbles. All of the Staff were always helpful and polite. Would definitely recommend this hotel if you are thinking of staying in Rome
